turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there, can you order a coffee for me from Peets?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, which store are you headed to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think there's one at Speer and Federal in Denver.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, got it, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I always get the Americano but I was thinking of something more exotic!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Here's a seasonal one that sounds good - Black and White Mocha...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's that about, is it chocolate?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's espresso and steamed milk with dark and white chocolate mocha with whipped cream on the top!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds tasty, why don't I go with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, what size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I always forget, is a tall bigger than a grande?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, the tall is 12 oz. and the Grande is 16.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The tall will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like there's a choice of milk, what do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk I think.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I comes with whipped cream remember - sure you don't want non-fat milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah, I'll work it off in the gym tomorrow.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And sprinkles on top!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll stick with the whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, it's ordered and will be ready at the Starbucks on Federal & Speer.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, I'll be there in a few minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're good to go, they'll text you a receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
